:/ipfs/QmTBExeX2SDTkn5xbk5ssbYSx7VqRp9H4Ux1CY4uQM4b9N"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"src/CharityTracker.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa2fa54c18beb151620a6ae83f0a230ea20a311ae2ccfa6de1b05536dabbd9935","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://67ad7f506b5f13844060cb61ed010edb69fdb3252d038aab4c33802ac83ae408","dweb:/ipfs/QmQBPRPKUZqYCyg6swqfwtHNzYcLsaNEMJx9zxEeWw9Yra"]},"src/libraries/Errors.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa82b87d0d61b2993f255bdf3b09cf2a56340e44293d489aa27ca5d650d1ff31c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5ccbcc96e50cdd3679dff759a47bf8600a12b9cc54275b51f6f013e2e1424795","dweb:/ipfs/QmcDhXjF8H7XNUiCxjdaQiC454Lc5NT81UaySDzNiPSFin"]},"src/types/DataStructures.sol":{"keccak256":"0xee3e2782ca36c1cafda2d36e8ac66e0a93388aed6b751b6f3fda975503d00c07","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f46287bc8dcfeb63a35639877444dc97d1d479f434b898a353a45c38b9e6ab21","dweb:/ipfs/QmTteM2dNh9EWRwkLuwdtwWsQLiLYZpzJW9mZ2ff2ftw8P"]}},"version":1}

createProject(address,uint256,string[],u.details: Only verified NGOs can create projects. All milestones must be defined upfront.      Sum of milestone amounts must be <= goal. Milestone IDs start at 0.

params.amounts: Array of milestone funding amounts (must match descriptions length)
params.donationToken: The token address for donations (address(0) for ETH)
params.goal: The total fundraising goal for the project

returns.projectId: The ID of the newly created project

donate(uint256).details: Only works for projects that accept ETH donations. Updates all donation accounting.      Follows CEI pattern for security. Reverts if project doesn't exist, is inactive,      is completed, or doesn't accept ETH.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to donate to

donateERC20(uint256,uint256).details: Only works for projects that accept ERC20 donations. Updates all donation accounting.      Follows CEI pattern for security. Reverts if project doesn't exist, is inactive,      is completed, doesn't accept ERC20, or if allowance/balance is insufficient.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to donate
params.projectId: The ID of the project to donate to

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Only owner can withdraw. Only works when contract is paused.      Withdraws all remaining balance from the project to the owner.      This is a last resort for stuck funds.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to withdraw funds from

returns._0: The total amount contributed by the donor
The Milestone struct containing all milestone data

returns.canRelease: True if quorum is met and balance is sufficient for release
returns.snapshot: The donation snapshot at vote start
returns.voteWeight: The total vote weight for this milestone

returns._0: The Project struct containing all project data
True if the donor has voted, false otherwise
True if the address is a verified NGO, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerNGO(address).details: Only owner can register NGOs. Reverts if NGO is already verified or address is zero.

params.ngo: The address of the NGO to register

releaseFunds(uint256).details: Only the project's NGO can release funds. Requires >50% quorum from donors.      Follows CEI pattern for security. Transfers funds (ETH or ERC20) to NGO.      Marks project as completed if this is the final milestone.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to release funds for

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeNGO(address).details: Only owner can revoke NGOs. Reverts if NGO is not currently verified.

params.ngo: The address of the NGO to revoke

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

voteMilestone(uint256).details: Only donors with contributions can vote. Vote weight equals total contribution.      One vote per milestone per donor. Snapshot is taken on first vote to prevent      donations after voting starts from affecting the quorum calculation.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to vote on

createProject(address,uint256,string[],u.notice: Create a new project with milestones

donateERC20(uint256,uint256).notice: Donate ERC20 tokens to a project

donorContributions(uint256,address).notice: Mapping of project ID to donor address to contribution amount

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal of funds from a project (only when paused)

getCurrentMilestone(uint256).notice: Get the current milestone for a project

getDonorContribution(uint256,address).notice: Get a donor's total contribution to a project

getMilestoneVoteStatus(uint256,uint256).notice: Get voting status for a milestone

getProjectMilestoneCount(uint256).notice: Get the total number of milestones for a project

hasDonorVoted(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Check if a donor has voted on a specific milestone

hasVoted(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Mapping of project ID to milestone ID to donor address to vote status

isVerifiedNGO(address).notice: Check if an address is a verified NGO

milestoneSnapshotDonations(uint256,uint2.notice: Mapping of project ID to milestone ID to donation snapshot at vote start

milestones(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping of project ID to milestone ID to Milestone struct

pause().notice: Pause the contract (blocks donations and fund releases).

projectMilestoneCount(uint256).notice: Mapping of project ID to total number of milestones

projects(uint256).notice: Mapping of project ID to Project struct

registerNGO(address).notice: Register a new NGO as verified

releaseFunds(uint256).notice: Release funds for the current milestone

revokeNGO(address).notice: Revoke verification status of an NGO

totalProjectDonations(uint256).notice: Mapping of project ID to total donations received

voteMilestone(uint256).notice: Vote on the current milestone for a project
